name: Tetris! Jump
description:
A game made for the Noche de Museos Jam!

What is this about?

A twist on the classic game of Tetris. Instead of falling pieces, the pieces move in the board! Move and jump to clear lines and try to achieve an even higher score!

Keep in mind that pieces move faster when they're airborne.

Controls

Left Arrow Key/Right Arrow Key: Move Left/Right

Up Arrow Key: Jump

X: Rotate clockwise

Z: Rotate counter-clockwise

Credits

Developers: alditto and _s_e_r_

Music: Korobeiniki (aka the Tetris theme song).
Background: Dusk Parallax Background by ansimuz.
